experience.title: Quantitative and Financial Analyst
experience.company: Delta Capital and Financial Services Pvt Ltd

experience.title: Data Scientist | HR Recruitement
experience.description: • Developed a state-of-the-art AI-based HR recruitment model, recruiting applicants on video responses to a set of questions. • Reconstructed research work on feature extraction and exploiting temporal dynamics of video data to capture video dynamics.• Two different output layers - eight output softmax layer corresponding to the number of expressions present in the CK+ training set, used for emotion classification on small datasets. For regression task with data from Aff-Wild2 dataset, the dense layer with two units for predicting valence and arousal were used.• Obtained 95% accuracy on test CK+ dataset and 50% accoracy on the JAFEE dataset.
experience.description_html: • Developed a state-of-the-art AI-based HR recruitment model, recruiting applicants on video responses to a set of questions. • Reconstructed research work on feature extraction and exploiting temporal dynamics of video data to capture video dynamics.• Two different output layers - eight output softmax layer corresponding to the number of expressions present in the CK+ training set, used for emotion classification on small datasets. For regression task with data from Aff-Wild2 dataset, the dense layer with two units for predicting valence and arousal were used.• Obtained 95% accuracy on test CK+ dataset and 50% accoracy on the JAFEE dataset.

experience.title: Open Domain Chat-Bot | NLP Intern | AIEdge Technologies Private Limited
experience.description: • Reviewed the newly proposed Open Domain ChatBot Blender by Facebook, to address the problem of loss of context.• Analyzed the Model Architectures, Decoding, Evaluation and Generative Methods and the Training data used in the Bot.• Followed research papers on the State of the art models: Transformers, Encoders, Bi-Polyencoders and Crossencoders.• Proposed an Intent Classifier Bi-lstm NN to keep track of the conversation and Similarity Models for output comparison.
